message: Let's start fair, I'll take the lion's share this time, but we can work out a more even split later if you accept.
You took the lion's share last time, now it's my turn. Let's see if you'll accept a more balanced split this time.
I appreciate your offer, but I think a more balanced split is possible. Let's aim for something closer to 50/50 this time.
I'm not ready to give up yet. Your offer is closer to 50/50, but I think I can do better than that.
